description: The project introduces a machine learning framework for automatically evaluating the trustworthiness of online domains using link-based and domain-level features. It predicts credibility scores for previously unseen websites based on features such as PageRank, and Spam Score, trained using a LightGBM regression model optimized via Optuna.

A deep exploration of Algorithmic Empathy, the next frontier in AI understanding. This project examines how machines can learn from human fallibility, model disagreement, and align with moral reasoning. It blends psychology, fairness metrics, interpretability, and co-learning design into one framework for humane intelligence.
A comprehensive tutorial and framework for applying physics-informed machine learning to photovoltaic materials discovery using Materials Project data.

FairML is a toolkit for auditing and visualizing fairness in machine learning models. It provides bias detection, synthetic bias injection, standard fairness metrics, a modular testing framework, and an interactive Streamlit dashboard for exploring model behavior.
A collection of AI-driven applications and experiments built using Next.js, Python  and  machine learning frameworks
A machine learning project built with Swift and Apples Natural Language framework to perform real-time sentiment analysis on user input.
Quantum Geometric Machine Learning framework with dual JAX/PyTorch backends for quantum-enhanced data analysis, topological feature extraction, and manifold learning

Applied causal machine learning and statistical analysis within a DAG-based framework to evaluate the effect of treatment (scholarship) on the outcome (student dropout). Demonstrated the causal impact of financial support on reducing dropout and uncovered heterogeneous treatment effects.
A Python framework for rigorous analysis of machine learning model variability and performance stability across multiple training runs.
Discover key research papers on Quantum Machine Learning (QML) and explore transfer learning frameworks, applications, and optimization strategies.
A hybrid optimization framework that integrates machine learning and optimization algorithms to improve couriertask allocation and routing efficiency in real-world conditions

Research framework for evaluation of bias mitigation techniques in machine learning. Includes implementation of 6 fairness algorithms, 4 ML models, statistical testing, and SHAP-based interpretability.

AI-driven discovery of Metal Organic Frameworks (MOFs) for efficient CO capture from cement plants and catalytic conversion into methanol using solar energy. Includes datasets, preprocessing scripts, machine learning models, and analysis notebooks.

An open-source Python framework that integrates machine learning interatomic  potentials (MLIPs) with a tailored batched optimization strategy, enabling rapid,  unbiased structure prediction across the full density range

A comprehensive educational repository featuring "from-scratch" implementations of fundamental machine learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning algorithms in Python, designed to illustrate the mathematical core of models without reliance on high-level frameworks.

An explainable machine learning framework for predicting compressive and flexural strengths of CNT-reinforced composites using Random Forest and XGBoost. Includes preprocessing scripts, model training, parity plots, ICE-based interpretability, and evaluation metrics.

A compact framework exploring distributed machine learning across data-parallel ML, model-parallel ML, hybrid parallel strategies, and federated learning. This repo provides modular examples of multi-node training, gradient synchronization, secure aggregation, and scalable distributed experiments.
An open-source framework for machine learning and other computations on decentralized data.

AI-Based Phishing Email Detection System  PhishShield: Intelligent Email Phishing Detection Using Machine Learning  Machine LearningDriven Phishing Email Classification System  A Secure Email Analysis Framework for Phishing Detection  Real-Time Phishing Email Detection Using Feature Engineering and ML.

This project implements an **AI-driven cryptanalysis framework for ECDSA**, combining: -  **Genetic Algorithms** -  **Machine Learning (XGBoost, LSTM, TensorFlow)** -  **Simulated Annealing Optimization** -  **Reinforcement Learning Environment (OpenAI Gym)** -  **Linear and Reuse Nonce Detection** -  **Hybrid AI-supervised attacks**
An MLOps framework to package, deploy, monitor and manage thousands of production machine learning models

A comprehensive machine learning project for credit risk assessment and Expected Credit Loss (ECL) calculation using synthetic loan data. This project implements Basel-compliant credit risk frameworks including Probability of Default (PD), Loss Given Default (LGD), Exposure at Default (EAD), and Expected Credit Loss (ECL) modeling.
Testing the machine learning framework GFlowNet for the directed studies course at Carleton University

This repository contains Machine learning framework for cancer drug discovery integrating QSAR modelling, ensemble learning, and transfer learning to predict adverse drug events and identify safe lead compounds. Implements molecular descriptor generation, data segmentation, and DNN-based safety modelling for drug development.

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.

ML-Potion is all about crafting your own machine-learning elixir using the ingredients and frameworks you prefer. Think of the library as a set of building blocksatoms, steps, and componentsthat you can mix, match, and sequence to build a fully customized training or inference pipeline.

A comprehensive, data-driven framework for optimizing shot peening processes to enhance the fatigue life of critical aerospace aluminum alloys. This project integrates Machine Learning (ML) for accurate residual stress prediction and Response Surface Methodology (RSM) for multi-objective process parameter optimization.

Welcome to our Image to Text and Text to Summary Generation web application! This open-source project is built with Flask, a Python web framework, and leverages cutting-edge machine learning technologies to provide two essential functionalities in one place.
Explainable Machine Learning Framework for Credit Risk Assessment

BRCATranstypia: A machine learning framework for breast cancer PAM50 subtype prediction using TCGA-BRCA transcriptomic data. It integrates preprocessing, feature selection, model training (Random Forest, SVM, XGBoost), and visualization of gene expression patterns.

Cerebrus is an intelligent malware analysis framework designed to provide multi-layered defense against modern cyber threats. It integrates static analysis, machine learning, external threat intelligence, and explainable AI (XAI) to deliver a robust platform for detecting known and unknown malware across various file formats.
A machine learning project that predicts visa approval status using applicant data. Built using Python, scikit-learn following the CRISP-DM framework.
This repository includes all the code developed during my in-depth exploration of machine learning and deep learning frameworks.
A Python Framework for Multi-Agent Programming with Machine Learning
A Hybrid Ensemble Forecasting Framework for Olympic Medal Prediction: Integrating Panel Regression, Difference-in-Differences, and Machine Learning Approaches
The Unified Disease Prediction System is a streamlined machine learning-based framework designed to predict Heart Disease, Parkinsons Disease, and Diabetes through a single, user-friendly interface.

Mechanics-informed ML framework for predicting crack paths in porous media. Combines FEM data with a Transformer model using physics-guided domain extraction and VSBC for stable training. Provides fast, accurate, and generalizable alternatives to costly FEM simulations.

Machine learning framework to detect and forecast unwind risk in the USD/JPY carry trade. The project includes a full data ingestion pipeline (FX, rates, volatility, risk indices), custom labels for unwind episodes, feature engineering, expanding-window cross-validation, and an out-of-sample trading strategy with risk-filtered carry returns.

A machine learning framework for simulating and predicting random walks. Includes parameterized bias sampling, enhanced feature engineering, multi-dimensional support, and real-world applications such as financial markets, IoT sensor drift, healthcare monitoring, and cybersecurity.

This is my final year project where I use machine learning to predict the binding success rate between drug molecules and protein targets. I will code the frontend off of the react framework and use a REST API to connect it to the backend - Neural network, Database
A neural network architecture for Machine Learning driven Data Quality Monitoring (DQM) framework in collider Experiments
Enterprise graph machine learning framework for billion-scale graphs for ML scientists and data scientists.
A Course on Educative.io about Machine learning with NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn, and more. Learn data analysis, feature engineering, and deep learning using industry-standard frameworks.

OECD Test Guidelines-based toxicity prediction using machine learning. Comprehensive computational toxicology framework with pre-trained models for genotoxicity, carcinogenicity, acute toxicity, DART, and ecotoxicity endpoints.
Visualizer (name is subjected to be changed later) is a framework and resource to allow people to create and use visualizers of different computer science and machine learning algorithms.
Machine Learning Framework for Crystal Energy Prediction

Portfolio Optimization is a data science project that creates investment portfolios to maximize returns and manage risk using mean-variance optimization and machine learning. It features customizable workflows and frameworks like PyPortfolioOpt, designed for finance students and early-career data scientists.

This project is a web-based application developed using Python's Flask framework that utilizes Machine Learning to provide personalized medicine, diet, and precaution recommendations based on user-inputted symptoms. The system is designed to act as a preliminary health advisory tool.

PhoenixAI: Revolutionizing test automation with AI.  Our intelligent framework uses machine learning, NLP, and computer vision to create unbreakable tests for UI and API, reducing maintenance and maximizing coverage.
An evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery.

Stat/ML framework for optimizing Laser Powder Bed Fusion (LPBF) manufacturing parameters  minimizes scrap and maximizes throughput through statistical inference, machine learning, and interactive visualization.
interpretable machine learning framework for pcos detection using shap and lime

A machine learning framework analyzing transportation policy impacts on urban congestion in the Philippines using Temporal Fusion Transformer models and causal inference. Features an interactive dashboard for policy simulation and includes 7,430+ observations from 12 data sources.

A coleo definitiva e curada de recursos de Inteligncia Artificial (AI), Machine Learning (ML) e Deep Learning (DL). Inclui frameworks, modelos, datasets, MLOps, LLMs e aplicaes financeiras/comerciais.

A real-time Digital Twin framework for Predictive Maintenance (PdM) of rotating machinery. Uses MQTT for live sensor data streaming, Streamlit for dashboard visualization, and Machine Learning models (Random Forest/LSTM) to predict Remaining Useful Life (RUL) and detect anomalies.

This project demonstrates a quantum machine learning classification using Qiskit framework. Specifically, it builds quantum support vector machine (QSVM) models on classical datasets (e.g., breast cancer and heart disease) and explores quantum kernels and variational quantum classifiers (VQC) to classify data into distinct classes.

A multi-level obfuscation framework (mild, moderate, strong) for privacy-preserving machine learning on network-traffic data. Includes dataset balancing, obfuscation scripts, TabNet models, baseline ML benchmarks, and reproducible experiments.

ONNX (Open Neural Network Exchange) is an open standard format for representing machine learning models. It was developed by Microsoft and Facebook to allow AI models trained in one framework to be used in another.
Comprehensive Tunneling Performance Analytics - ML framework for MTBM optimization with 90%+ accuracy, 50+ SQL queries, Power BI dashboards |          Python, scikit-learn, SQL"
A complete end-to-end framework for classifying corporate ESG performance using machine learning, SHAP, and interactive dashboards.
Implementation of a unified explainability and trust framework for machine learning-based flood risk prediction, including SHAP, LIME, counterfactuals, robustness analysis, and the UFXI metric.
A unified framework for machine learning with time series
Comprehensive tennis analytics and machine learning framework to quantify player performance, match dynamics, and tour-level insights.
Repositrio com diferos estudos sobre machine learning, conceitos de Python como POO, frameworks como Django e mais
A Python modular framework for backtesting equity trading strategies with full performance analytics and "plug and play" strategies, including machine learning strategies.
Translation exploration with Transformers and Machine Learning Experimentation Platfroms

Comprehensive quantitative analysis of global anti-money laundering risks across 203 countries using advanced statistical methods and machine learning. Provides evidence-based policy frameworks for international AML/CFT cooperation, regional coordination strategies, and strategic intervention targeting.

Anti Chinese government information.  996.ICU709Friends who live in China and have real name on account, please don't star this repo, or else the police might pay you a visit.  Home to the mega-FAQ, news compilation, restaurant and music recommendations.Heil Xi . 6.4
Python AI framework (running on both CPU and GPU) for machine learning and deep learning.

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.

We present a comprehensive physics-informed machine learning frameworkPhysics-Guided Equation Discovery (PGED)that discovers a full, interpretable dynamical equation for the geomagnetic Dst index using only its historical time series. Trained on 139,872 hourly measurements, PGED recovers an 11-term sparse ordinary differential equation that.
This repository contains a simple To-Do app made with a Next.js framework and a FastAPI connection to a Machine Learning model, made in preparation for the Junction 2025 hackathon.
A Rust machine learning framework.

A collection of end-to-end machine learning projects showcasing my skills in data preprocessing, feature engineering, model building, evaluation, and deployment. Each project is designed to demonstrate real-world problem-solving, statistical reasoning, and model interpretability using industry-standard tools and frameworks.

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations

Official implementation of our paper "Unsupervised Active Learning via Natural Feature Progressive Framework", currently under review at IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI)
SmallML is a three-layer Bayesian framework that enables small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to build production-grade machine learning models despite having limited customer data.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.

This repository contains a collection of Python programs and Jupyter notebooks focusing on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) algorithms. It covers implementations, experiments, and hands-on code examples using popular libraries and frameworks in Python.
Framework for machine learning with spiking neural networks
Adaptive Threat Hunting: A Machine Learning-Based Real-Time Network Anomaly Detection System

A study on optimizing machine learning models for yield in efficient markets. This repository contains the pipeline for identifying and correcting calibration errors in XGBoost, using a walk-forward validation framework and probability capping to generate a consistently profitable sports handicapping strategy.

A reproducible framework for probabilistic decision modeling and simulation in high-volatility time series. Demonstrates how to use statistical indicators, machine learning classifiers, and automated workflows to test and evaluate data-driven decision rules under uncertainty.
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone

This project contains a set of **Jupyter notebooks** to help students and data scientists deeply understand and visualize the *four main classification metrics* used in machine learning: **Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and F1 Score**.

Python framework for building, validating, and backtesting quantitative trading strategies with machine learning, featuring robust data analysis, realistic backtesting, and comprehensive risk analytics.

A curated portfolio of high-impact Data Science projects, featuring Machine Learning (Prediction Models), Data Analysis, and utility applications. Demonstrates proficiency in Python, ML frameworks, and business intelligence.
A comprehensive testing suite for validating ROCm (Radeon Open Compute) functionality with Python machine learning frameworks and libraries.

This project Predicts plant health using NDVI values, classifying leaves as Healthy, Unhealthy, or Dead. NDVI drives prediction, while OpenCV showcases image color and edges, and CNN (MobileNetV2) extracts features for visualization. Includes EDA plots for NDVI distribution and category analysis in a concise, educational framework.

This project focuses on building a multi-model ransomware detection framework using both classical Machine Learning (ML) and **Deep Learning (DL) techniques.   The goal is to detect ransomware activity including zero-day variants across diverse, real-world datasets with a focus on binary (benign vs. ransomware) and family-level classification

Machine learning framework to analyze correlations in PrizePicks betting. Includes data pipeline for player stats, regression and ML models for correlation, and visualizations to support strategy simulations using public sports databases.
An orchestration framework for End-to-End Machine Learning Serving with Resource Optimization on Heterogeneous Edge

This project develops a hybrid, interpretable framework that integrates physics-based resistance-capacitance (RC) models with machine learning regression algorithms to predict indoor thermal dynamics in buildings. The workflow demonstrates how domain knowledge can be embedded within data-driven models to enhance interpretability and accuracy
This repository is to test popular machine learning and deep learning frameworks
